quote: Now, sprawled comfortably in his motel bed, Anson Sharp enjoyed the sleep of the amoral, which is far deeper and more restful than the sleep of the just, the righteous, and the innocent.
quote_letters: NOW SPRAWLED COMFORTABLY IN HIS MOTEL BED ANSON SHARP ENJOYED THE SLEEP OF THE AMORAL WHICH IS FAR DEEPER AND MORE RESTFUL THAN THE SLEEP OF THE JUST THE RIGHTEOUS AND THE INNOCENT
